resources.string:
My name is OLATUNJI Rokeeb Olanrewaju

 A part four student of computer science and engineering department
 Obafemi Awolowo University.
 I’m an aspiring software developer (mobile app).
 I would like the opportunity to intern at your firm during my 6month Industrial Training period (September 2019 – February 2020).
 I believe its the best place to utilize my current software skills and knowledge, and also help me to further develop these skills in a practical and fast-paced environment.
 I’m a motivated, dedicated, loyal and ambitious person who can work as a team player under little or no supervision. I always strive to improve myself and I believe I would be able to tackle any challenges I may encounter during this internship. I look forward to a positive response from you.

 Madison Blackstone is a director of brand marketing, with experience managing global teams and multi-million-dollar campaigns.
 Her background in brand strategy, visual design, and account management inform her mindful but competitive approach.
 Madison is fueled by her passion for understanding the nuances of cross-cultural advertising.
 She considers herself a ‘forever student,’ eager to both build on her academic foundations in psychology and sociology and stay in tune with the latest digital marketing strategies through continued coursework.
 Her hunger for knowledge and determination to turn information into action has contributed to her most recent success at Rockwell Group, where she led international, award-winning campaigns.

 Thanks.
